name: backgnd15
description:
v4w.enko - "backgnd15"
This is procedural sound I made with my custom instrument - node based synthesizer I created by myself with custom coding in the software of Max/Msp. This sound piece consists from realtime work of group of oscillators tuned in harmonic way and running algorithmically according to the "additive synthesis" with "random form".  I use such a system to generate all my sound to all my audiovisual works. Recorded in realtime from the live algorithm. The composition seems to be a "sustain" sound for the ambient lovers and drone funs. Have a nice listening / using / mixing  process.  No sound effects are used. Pure wave physics.  Microsound.
